fields.name: Source
fields.title: Trench
fields.description: The name of the trench from which this sample was taken.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.title: SampleNumber
fields.description: Sample number is a sequential number assigned per trench at the time the sample is taken.

fields.name: Origin
fields.title: Origin
fields.description: The processing step from which the sample was taken (e.g. excavation or sieving, etc.

fields.name: Creator
fields.title: Creator
fields.description: Initials of staff person who created this record.

fields.name: Date
fields.title: Date
fields.description: The date the sample was taken in format DD:MM:YY.

fields.name: RelationBelongsTo
fields.title: RelationBelongsTo
fields.description: In iDig you can say a sample belongs to another or multiple other things.

fields.name: RelationIncludes
fields.title: RelationIncludes
fields.description: In iDig a sample can include another or multiple other things (e.g. photographs)
